metadata.synopsis: Just some chatter during the duel.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Triggers when Laezel is dropped below half health during the midnight Romance2 fight. Will trigger instead of the OnHit dialog if players take her down to below half with one hit.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Keep it coming. Give me all you've got!
0.context: NodeContext: Not vehement, Lae'zel calls this out if romance player brings her to half health in their battle for dominance.
